root.description: PC System RequirementsMinimum:CPU: Pentium III 800MHz or aboveRAM: 256MB or moreGraphics Card: 32MB, DirectX7.0 or aboveHD: 2GBInternet: 56K ModemRecommended:CPU: P4 1.6GHz or aboveRAM: 512MB or aboveGraphics Card: GF4, 32MB or moreHD: 2GBInternet: ADSL or above
